net.rim.device.api.ui.component
Class Status

java.lang.Object

                  net.rim.device.api.ui.container.PopupScreen
                      net.rim.device.api.ui.component.Status
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdjustmentListener
public final class Status
extends PopupScreen

Simple dialog to show ongoing status.

Behaviour
This extension of PopupScreen lets you show a simple status screen which the user can dismiss with a trackwheel click or by typing SPACE or ESCAPE.

Field Detail

GLOBAL_STATUS

public static final long GLOBAL_STATUS
Displays the screen as a global status.

See Also:
Constant Field Values


Method Detail

show

public static void show(String message)
Shows a status screen for two seconds.

Invoke this method to show a status screen to the user for two seconds. This method blocks until the user dismisses this screen, or until the two seconds pass.

This method shows a screen using the predefined icon Bitmap.INFORMATION.

Parameters:
message - Message to display.
Throws:
RuntimeException - If no timer is available for use by this screen.

show

public static void show(String message,
                        int time)
Shows a status screen for specified time.

Invoke this method to show a status screen to the user. This method blocks until the user dismisses this screen, or until the number of seconds specified in the time parameter passes.

This method shows a screen using the predefined icon Bitmap.INFORMATION.

Parameters:
message - Message to display.
time - Milliseconds for which this screen should remain visible.
Throws:
RuntimeException - If no timer is available for use by this screen.

show

public static void show(String message,
                        Bitmap bitmap,
                        int time)
Shows a status screen with specified icon, for specified time.

Invoke this method to show a status screen to the user. This method blocks until the user dismisses this screen, or until the number of seconds specified in the time parameter passes.

Parameters:
message - Message to display.
bitmap - Icon to show in the left part of this screen.
time - Milliseconds for which this screen should remain visible.
Throws:
RuntimeException - If no timer is available for use by this screen.

show

public static void show(String message,
                        Bitmap bitmap,
                        int time,
                        long style,
                        boolean allowDismiss,
                        boolean block,
                        int priority)
Shows a status screen of a particular style for specified time.

Invoke this method to show a status screen of a particular style to the user.

Parameters:
message - Message to display.
bitmap - Icon to show in the left part of this screen.
time - Milliseconds for which this screen should remain visible.
style - The style of the status screen
allowDismiss - If true, allows the status screen to be dismissed early.
block - Causes this method to block until the user dismisses this screen, or until the number of seconds specified in the time parameter passes. This parameter has no effect if the Status.GLOBAL_STATUS style is set.
priority - Display priority for this screen, if it is a Status.GLOBAL_STATUS screen.
Throws:
RuntimeException - If no timer is available for use by this screen.
